message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $150?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of making an offer of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. Would you be willing to meet me at $135?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $125?
I understand you're looking to save a bit more, Bob, but I've already met you halfway once. I'm willing to go a little further, but I need to make a profit. How about $132?
I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $128?
